input.sentences: mother and father goose lived near the pond .
they had a large family | and it was n't easy raising them all .
it took all their time keeping their brood in line .
on the pond or on the shore | those little goslings were a pack of trouble .
however | it was all worth it | as nothing gave them more pride than watching their little guys grow up to be big | strong geese .
output.sentences: Mom and Dad Geese met on a sunny day.
They had a lot of babies the next spring.
The mom taught the babies to swim.
The dad taught them to look for bugs.
The two geese were great parents.
